attributes.long_name: tracking configuration - acquisition status : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode
corrected AGC for c band: l1a_echo_sar_ku mode; agc corrected for instrumental errors (calibration)
corrected AGC for ku band: l1a_echo_sar_ku mode; agc corrected for instrumental errors (calibration)
agccode for c band : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode
agccode for ku band : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode
altitude of satellite : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode; altitude of the center of mass of the satellite
bursts counter within the tracking cycle : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode
bursts counter within the product : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode; range 1 to number of records in the product

ku band burst phase corrections (cal1) : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode; average of the CAL1 Phase Burst Calibrations in the temporal window defined in S3__SR_1_CONCAX for the sensing start time of the product.

ku band burst power corrections (cal1) : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode; average of the CAL1 Power Burst Calibrations in the temporal window defined in S3__SR_1_CONCAX for the sensing start time of the product.
tracking configuration - closed loop gain : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode
distance antenna-CoG correction : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode; distance in the z-component between the centre of mass of the satellite and the altimeter antenna reference point
applied altitude command COR2 : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode
altitude command COR2 computed with nav DEM : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode
tracking configuration - DEM EEPROM read access : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode
distance error computed on the echo of the cycle (N-2) in open loop mode
number of samples in I2+Q2, I and Q echoes; set to be compliant with the CF-1.6 convention
number of samples in I2+Q2, I and Q echoes; set to be compliant with the CF-1.6 convention
time status flag : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode; flag indicating if the time is synchronized or not with GPS time

c band samples of the normalized GPRW (cal2) : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode; normalized GPRW waveform correction to be applied. The zero-frequency gate of the GPRW is at gate 63 (0-based indexing). The spectrum is the average of the LTM GPRW spectrum in the temporal window defined in S3__SR_1_CONCAX for the sensing start time of the product.

ku band samples of the normalized GPRW (cal2) : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode; normalized GPRW waveform correction to be applied. The zero-frequency gate of the GPRW is at gate 63 (0-based indexing). The spectrum is the average of the LTM GPRW spectrum in the temporal window defined in S3__SR_1_CONCAX for the sensing start time of the product.
applied altitude command H0 : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode
altitude command H0 computed with nav DEM : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode
i2+q2 measurement for c band : l1a_echo_PLRM mode; tracking echoes from on board tracker. For engineering analysis only
i2+q2 measurement for ku band : l1a_echo_PLRM mode; tracking echoes from on board tracker. For engineering analysis only
c band echoes, i measurements : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode; c band echoes of a burst, I values (2*128 samples) in the time domain. The pulses are not corrected for AGC
ku band echoes, i measurements : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode; ku band echoes of a burst, I values (64*128 samples) in the time domain. The pulses are not corrected for AGC
internal path correction for ku band : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode; value the closest in time from the burst time tag
isp coarse time : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode
isp coarse time : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode
isp coarse time : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode
isp fine time : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode
isp fine time : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode
isp fine time : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode
latitude : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode
latitude : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode
latitude : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode
latitude : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode
longitude : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode
longitude : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode
longitude : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode
longitude : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode
loss of track criterion : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode
navigation bulletin source identifier : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode
navigation bulletin status : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode
operating instrument : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode
orbital altitude rate : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode
satellite pointing angle - pitch : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode; value for the closest in time from the burst time tag, given in the nadir pointing reference frame
sral mispointing angle - pitch : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode; value for the closest in time from the burst time tag, given in the nadir pointing reference frame
c band echoes, q measurements : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode; c band echoes of a burst, q values (2*128 samples) in the time domain. The pulses are not corrected for AGC
ku band echoes, q measurements: l1a_echo_sar_ku mode; ku band echoes of a burst, q values (64*128 samples) in the time domain. The pulses are not corrected for AGC

corrected range for ku band : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode; distance between the altimeter reference point and the surface height associated to a range gate used as reference inside the tracking window (reference tracking point), corrected for USO frequency drift and internal path correction
satellite pointing angle - roll : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode; value for the closest in time from the burst time tag, given in the nadir pointing reference frame
sral mispointing angle - roll : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode; value for the closest in time from the burst time tag, given in the nadir pointing reference frame
number of C-band pulses per burst in SAR mode; set to be compliant with the CF-1.6 convention
number of Ku-band pulses per burst in SAR mode; set to be compliant with the CF-1.6 convention
number of Ku-band pulses per burst in SAR mode; set to be compliant with the CF-1.6 convention
sar mode identifier : l1a_echo_sar_ku mode

scaling factor for sigma0 evaluation for ku band: l1a_echo_sar_ku mode; scaling factor corrected for AGC instrumental errors and internal calibration

internal calibration correction on Sigma0 for ku band: l1a_echo_sar_ku mode
